title: Higher wages shift auto supply left

content.question: The supply curve for automobiles will shift to the left in response to

choices.label: an increase in the efficiency of robot technology
an increse in wages in the automobile industry
a decrease in the number of consumers purchasing automobiles
a decrease in the interest rates for automobile loans

content.answer: an increse in wages in the automobile industry

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
